captions.text:
It's down there somewhere.
Let me take another look.

Your wife owes money
to jackie treehorn,

That means you own
money to jackie treehorn.

You got the wrong guy.
I'm the dude, man.

Do you see a wedding
ring on my finger?

Does this place look
like I'm fucking married?

Isn't this guy supposed
to be a millionaire?

He looks like
a fucking loser.

ś la la la la
la la la la la ś

ś la la la la
la la la la la ś

ś la la la la
la la la la la ś
ś la la la la ś

comments.text:
I once got pulled over by a cop and he searched my car. When he got to my 
golf bag he asked me, "What is this?" and I couldn't help myself I said, 
"Obviously you're not a bowler." I thought I was gonna get arrested with 
the look he gave me. Kids, don't be a smart ass to the cops, even when they 
deserve it.﻿
comments.author: Logan Cracraft

comments.text: +Logan Cracraft The Dude abides.

comments.text:
That was so funny. I pray for the day I can say that to a cop. I'll take my 
chances on getting arrested. You saying that was so fucking worth it.
comments.author: haymaker710

comments.text:
+tenmaruhakuchou That was the joke. The Dude says "obviously you aren't a 
golfer" when the guy asks about the bowling ball. Logan had a bag of golf 
stuff, so naturally he had to do the opposite and say bowler.

comments.text:
Nothing. He finished looking the car over, I got a verbal warning about my 
speed (the reason he pulled me over) and I went on my marry way. He was 
really reaching for the speeding thing and was hoping to catch me riding 
dirty. When that didn't happen he had no choice but to let me go, even if I 
had pissed him off. My warning still stands though, if he had been a dirty 
cop he might have found a dime bag of weed on the ground (because it fell 
out of his pocket) and there ya go, instant possession charge. Happens more 
than you might think in rural communities.
comments.author: Logan Cracraft
